alert.note: Alert for Clarke; Decatur; Madison; Ringgold; Taylor; Union (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 26 at 2:40AM CST until November 26 at 6:00AM CST by NWS DesMoines
info.description: ...Light snow continuing early this morning... .Light snow continues early this morning over much of central Iowa with road conditions slick and the Iowa DOT reporting partially to mostly snow covered. The snow will begin to wind down from west to east later this morning. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM CST EARLY THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch. * WHERE...Much of South Central Iowa. * WHEN...Until 6 AM CST early this morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...This is the first measurable snowfall of the season in these areas. Be prepared for snow covered roads and allow extra time to reach your destination.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest travel conditions, check the Iowa 511 app, www.511ia.org, or dial 511.

area.areaDesc: Clarke; Decatur; Madison; Ringgold; Taylor; Union
